fact: When archeologists found King Tuts Tomb, they found graffiti on the wall saying "Chuck Norris was here".
author: Albert Epstein

fact: Chuck Norris invented the Olympic Games in hopes of finding a worthy opponent.
author: Alfred Nobell

fact: Chuck Norris can play Tetris on a Rubix cube.
author: Audrey Heartburn

fact: Chuck Norris threw a grenade and killed 50 people, then it exploded.
author: Jack Nicholsun

fact: The THX sound is actually a recording of Chuck Norris' yawn.
author: Tom Hangs

fact: Chuck Norris has to use oven mitts otherwise he'll burn the pans.
author: John Lemon

fact: Death once had a near-Chuck-Norris experience.
author: Abraham Linkedin

fact: Once a cobra bit Chuck Norris' leg. After five days of excruciating pain, the cobra died.
author: Mark Zuckermountain

fact: Chuck Norris can kill two stones with one bird.
author: Bill Crates

fact: Chuck can set ants on fire with a magnifying glass. At night.
author: Stephen Jogs

fact: Chuck Norris can hear sign language.
author: Anthony Hotkeys

fact: Chuck Norris makes onions cry.
author: Harrison Chord

fact: Chuck Norris knows Victoria's secret.
author: Harry Weeder

fact: Chuck Norris counted to infinity. Twice.
author: Ron Weaslewsky

fact: Chuck Norris beat the sun in a staring contest.
author: Severus Snack

fact: Chuck Norris is the reason Waldo is hiding.
author: Albus Smartledore

fact: Chuck Norris is the only person that can punch a cyclops between the eye.
author: Ronald McSanders

fact: Brett Favre can throw a football over 50 yards. Chuck Norris can throw Brett Favre even further.
author: Christiano Ronaldson

fact: It is considered a great accomplishment to go down Niagara Falls in a wooden barrel. Chuck Norris can go up Niagara Falls in a cardboard box.
author: David Forham

fact: Chuck Norris plays russian roulette with a fully loded revolver... and wins.
author: Fred Waterstone

fact: Chuck Norris can build a snowman out of rain.
author: Albert Epstein

fact: Chuck Norris can strangle you with a cordless phone.
author: Alfred Nobell

fact: Chuck Norris was once charged with three attempted murders in Boulder County, but the Judge quickly dropped the charges because Chuck Norris does not "attempt" murder.
author: Audrey Heartburn

fact: Chuck Norris was once on Celebrity Wheel of Fortune and was the first to spin. The next 29 minutes of the show consisted of everyone standing around awkwardly, waiting for the wheel to stop.
author: Jack Nicholsun

fact: Giraffes were created when Chuck Norris uppercutted a horse.
author: Tom Hangs

fact: If it looks like chicken, tastes like chicken, and feels like chicken but Chuck Norris says its beef, then it's beef.
author: John Lemon

fact: When the Boogeyman goes to sleep every night he checks his closet for Chuck Norris.
author: Abraham Linkedin

fact: Chuck Norris can speak braille.
author: Mark Zuckermountain

fact: Leading hand sanitizers claim they can kill 99.9 percent of germs. Chuck Norris can kill 100 percent of whatever the hell he wants.
author: Bill Crates

fact: Chuck Norris can do a wheelie on a unicycle.
author: Stephen Jogs

fact: Chuck actually died four years ago, but the Grim Reaper can't get up the courage to tell him.
author: Anthony Hotkeys

fact: When Chuck Norris was in middle school, his English teacher assigned an essay: "What is courage?" He received an A+ for turning in a blank page with only his name at the top.
author: Harrison Chord

fact: Chuck Norris doesn't have good aim. His bullets just know better than to miss.
author: Harry Weeder

fact: Chuck Norris can pick oranges from an apple tree and make the best lemonade youve ever tasted.
author: Ron Weaslewsky

fact: When a zombie apocalypse starts, Chuck Norris doesn't try to survive. The zombies do.
author: Severus Snack

fact: The leaning tower of Pisa leans because Chuck Norris once leaned on it to tie his shoe.
author: Albus Smartledore

fact: Chuck Norris can make pancakes on a waffle iron.
author: Ronald McSanders

fact: Chuck Norris will never have a heart attack... even a heart isnt foolish enough to attack Chuck Norris.
author: Christiano Ronaldson

fact: Chuck Norris doesnt wear a watch. He decides what time it is.
author: David Forham

fact: Chuck Norris beat Halo 1, 2, and 3 on Legendary with a broken Guitar Hero controller.
author: Fred Waterstone

fact: Chuck Norris can kill your imaginary friends.
author: Albert Epstein

fact: Chuck Norris's computer has no "backspace" button, Chuck Norris doesn't make mistakes.
author: Alfred Nobell

fact: Chuck Norris's daughter lost her virginity, he got it back.
author: Audrey Heartburn

fact: The real reason Hitler killed himself is because he found out that Chuck Norris is Jewish.
author: Jack Nicholsun

fact: Chuck Norris once went to mars. Thats why there are no signs of life.
author: Tom Hangs

fact: Chuck Norris tells Simon what to do.
author: John Lemon

fact: The reason the Holy Grail has never been recovered is because nobody is brave enough to ask Chuck Norris to give up his favourite coffee mug.
author: Abraham Linkedin

fact: When Bruce Banner gets mad he turns into the Hulk. When the Hulk gets mad he turns into Chuck Norris. When Chuck Norris gets mad, run.
author: Mark Zuckermountain

fact: Chuck Norris sleeps with a pillow under his gun.
author: Bill Crates

fact: Chuck Norris's Blood Type is AK-47.
author: Stephen Jogs

fact: Chuck Norris doesn't play "hide-and-seek." He plays "hide-and-pray-I-don't-find-you."
author: Anthony Hotkeys

fact: When Chuck Norris enters a room, he doesn't turn the lights on, he turns the dark off.
author: Harrison Chord

fact: M.C. Hammer learned the hard way that Chuck Norris can touch this.
author: Harry Weeder

fact: Bill Gates lives in constant fear that Chuck Norris' PC will crash.
author: Ron Weaslewsky

fact: Chuck Norris is the only person on the planet that can kick you in the back of the face.
author: Severus Snack

fact: Chuck Norris' dog is trained to pick up his own poop because Chuck Norris will not take shit from anyone.
author: Albus Smartledore

fact: When Chuck Norris gives you the finger, he's telling you how many seconds you have left to live.
author: Ronald McSanders

fact: Chuck Norris doesn't cheat death. He wins fair and square.
author: Christiano Ronaldson

fact: Chuck Norris puts the "laughter" in "manslaughter".
author: David Forham

fact: Chuck refers to himself in the fourth person.
author: Fred Waterstone

fact: There is no theory of evolution, just a list of creatures Chuck Norris allows to live.
author: Albert Epstein

fact: Chuck Norris' calendar goes straight from March 31st to April 2nd. No one fools Chuck Norris.
author: Alfred Nobell

fact: Chuck Norris doesn't get lost. The Earth just reorients itself to his location.
author: Audrey Heartburn

fact: Chuck Norris doesn't dial the wrong number, you pick up the wrong phone.
author: Jack Nicholsun

fact: Chuck Norris has a diary. It's called the Guinness Book of World Records.
author: Tom Hangs

fact: Chuck Norris once bowled a perfect game with a marble.
author: John Lemon

fact: Chuck Norris CAN find the end of a circle.
author: Abraham Linkedin

fact: The only time Chuck Norris was wrong was when he thought he had made a mistake.
author: Mark Zuckermountain

fact: Chuck Norris can drown a fish.
author: Bill Crates

fact: Chuck Norris is the only man to ever defeat a brick wall in a game of tennis.
author: Stephen Jogs

fact: Chuck Norris can unscramble an egg.
author: Anthony Hotkeys

fact: Chuck Norris has cows grilling his steaks for him.
author: Harrison Chord

fact: Chuck Norris can cut a knife with butter.
author: Harry Weeder

fact: Chuck Norris can speak French... In Russian.
author: Ron Weaslewsky

fact: A bulletproof vest wears Chuck Norris for protection.
author: Severus Snack

fact: Big foot claims he saw Chuck Norris.
author: Albus Smartledore

fact: Chuck Norris can hit you so hard your blood will bleed.
author: Ronald McSanders

fact: The saddest moment for a child is not when he learns Santa Claus isn't real, it's when he learns Chuck Norris is.
author: Christiano Ronaldson

fact: Jack was nimble, Jack was quick, but Jack still couldn't dodge Chuck Norris' roundhouse kick.
author: David Forham

fact: If you spell Chuck Norris wrong on Google it doesn't say, "Did you mean Chuck Norris?" It simply replies, "Run while you still have the chance."
author: Fred Waterstone

fact: Chuck can divide by zero.
author: Albert Epstein

fact: Chuck Norris' tears cure cancer. Too bad he has never cried.
author: Alfred Nobell

fact: Some kids piss their name in the snow. Chuck Norris can piss his name into concrete.
author: Audrey Heartburn

fact: Chuck Norris went to a feminist rally and came back with his shirt ironed and holding a sandwich.
author: Jack Nicholsun

fact: Chuck Norris once walked away from a fight with two broken ribs and a dislocated arm. He hasn't given them back yet...
author: Tom Hangs

fact: Chuck Norris caught the Gingerbread man.
author: John Lemon

fact: Chuck Norris doesn't wake up with morning wood, he wakes up with morning steel.
author: Abraham Linkedin

fact: Chuck Norris has inside jokes with complete strangers.
author: Mark Zuckermountain

fact: Chuck Norris once climbed Mt. Everest in 15 minutes, 14 of which he was building a snowman at the bottom.
author: Bill Crates

fact: When Chuck Norris was born he drove his mom home from the hospital.
author: Stephen Jogs

fact: Every Chuck Norris joke is a five star joke just because it says Chuck Norris.
author: Anthony Hotkeys

fact: Chuck Norris can make a slinky go upstairs.
author: Harrison Chord

fact: The original title for Alien vs. Predator was Alien and Predator vs Chuck Norris. The film was cancelled shortly after going into preproduction. No one would pay nine dollars to see a movie fourteen seconds long.
author: Harry Weeder

fact: When Chuck Norris looks in a mirror the mirror shatters, because not even glass is stupid enough to get in between Chuck Norris and Chuck Norris.
author: Ron Weaslewsky

fact: The reason newborn babies cry is because they know they have just entered a world with Chuck Norris.
author: Severus Snack

fact: Chuck Norris can delete the Recycling Bin.
author: Albus Smartledore

fact: Superman owns a pair of Chuck Norris pajamas.
author: Ronald McSanders

fact: Police label anyone attacking Chuck Norris as a Code 45-11.... a suicide.
author: Christiano Ronaldson

fact: The Great Wall of China was originally created to keep Chuck Norris out. It failed miserably.
author: David Forham

fact: When you ask Chuck Norris for an autograph, he pours ink on his boot and roundhouse kicks you in the face.
author: Fred Waterstone
